content:
Absolutely! Besides the famous Fish Sauce Wings, here are a few other popular dishes at Pok Pok you might want to try:

1. Ike's Vietnamese Fish Sauce Wings - This is a version of the famous Pok Pok Fish Sauce Wings that are marinated with honey, coriander, garlic, and other spices, and then topped with crispy fried garlic and shallots.

2. Papaya Pok Pok - This is the restaurant's signature dish, a tangy and spicy salad made with shredded green papaya, dried shrimp, garlic, chili, peanuts, and fish sauce.

3. Khao Soi - This is a Northern Thai curry noodle soup with a rich, coconut-based broth, topped with crispy egg noodles, pickled mustard greens, and lime.

4. Muu Paa Kham Waan - This is a sweet and sour pork belly dish that is slow-cooked with garlic, cinnamon, and palm sugar until it's melt-in-your-mouth tender.

5. Yam Makheua Yao - This is a salad made with grilled Japanese eggplant, shallots, garlic, chili, fish sauce, lime, and herbs.

All of these dishes are authentic and delicious, and they will give you a great taste of the complex and exciting flavors of Thai cuisine.
